column4: Hi ! Why Jdownloader uses more than 230 mb on my Ubuntu 9.1 but on Windows 7 max 100 mb ? :( Both of OS are 64 bit ?
different JVMs between Win7 and Ubuntu 9.10 - are you using Sun's JVM under Windows, and whatever implementation ubuntu drops in their repos now-a-days
then I'm going to say that it's likely not using more memory, it's reporting different memory usage due to the difference Linux displays managed memory and how Windwos displays managed memory

No, I said it's reporting different values, not that the differences is necessarily better or worse.  Linux memory management and how it's displayed is a muddy, murky thing, especially when you start diving into linked libraries
